product_name: REI Recycled Fleece Gloves - Men's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: The REI Tech-Compatible Recycled Fleece gloves keep your hands warm when you're walking the dog or taking a hike. And you can leave them on to use your touch-screen smartphone. Conductive material at the tips of the thumbs and index fingers allows you to send text messages and operate your touch-screen phone without having to take your gloves off. Midweight recycled Polartec(R) polyester fleece is soft and warm. Have synthetic grippy palms. Overstock.
short_description: The REI Tech-Compatible Recycled Fleece gloves keep your hands warm when you're walking the dog or taking a hike. And you can leave them on to use your touch-screen smartphone.
